page.title: 19A MIDHURST TEENAGER'S LIFE
page.content: Teenage life in 1985 can be enjoyable but can also be difficult.School life is much improved.Modern facilities are provided for our education.Interesting events such as foreign exchanges and outings to exhibitions and famous places take place.Sports facilities have improved. Sport is popular as a hobby and we use the facilities at the Grange Centre. Some have bad relationships with their parents.This is a common problem between children and adults.Some parents are uncaring.This can lead children to take up smoking or drug abuse.Examinations are important and decide our future.Many of us get nervous and perform badly.Unemployment among teenagers is high and a great worry to us.Teenage life is difficult and complicated yet it can also be pleasant and interesting.
